scripts.test:basic: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_basic_report.json dist/tests/basic-load-test.js
scripts.test:api: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_api_report.json dist/tests/api-validation-test.js
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_stress_report.json dist/tests/stress-test.js
scripts.test:checkout: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_checkout_report.json dist/tests/checkout-performance-test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:basic && npm run test:api && npm run test:stress && npm run test:checkout
